AEGON CORPORATE RESPONSIBILITY REPORT 2006     
Lasting	value	
AEGON	 has	been	included	 in	both	the	Dow	Jones	 Sustainability	 and	
fTSE4Good	 indices	 for	the	past	several	 years.	 These	 indices	 rank	
companies	 according	 to	their	ability	 to	manage	 a	range	 of	economic,	
social	 and	environmental	 risks.	AEGON	 regards	 its	continued	 inclusion	
in	these	 indices	 as	recognition	 of	the	efforts	 it	has	made	 to	deliver	
lasting	 value	 to	its	customers,	 employees	 and	business	 partners	 as	
well	as	to	its	shareholders.
